website_summaries.verdict: Simply designed chemical-resistant gloves that are comfortable and practical.
pros: Gives you protection against harsh liquids and chemicals with a PVC coating that also yields a textured grip
Uses a cotton lining for comfort and easy on and off
Glove measures 12 inches from fingertip to the cuff
Provides a nice level of protection for your hands and wrists
cons: Not made for cold weather use

customer_reviews.title: Wow...slot of value for only six dollars
customer_reviews.text: Wow....for six dollars. These gloves are well worth the money. Very strong . I bought these gloves for magnet fishing. I think there everything I was wanting and more. Big enough to wear cotton gloves under. Soft enough so you can move fingers well. Will be doing a update on these gloves in a few weeks. Don't think these gloves will disappoint. Update.....I've had these gloves for few months and use them almost everyday for magnet fishing. Great gloves. Super strong. No holes yet. Still 100 percent waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Carl...magnet fishing dude

customer_reviews.title: The most import thing to me it get items to my house not used especially with everything going on .
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package the gloves was dirty and used. I don't have words to describe how I feel I left them where the delivery person left them on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Williams

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 pairs of these gloves for the volunteer crew I work with disinfecting and cleaning medical equipment like wheelchairs, transport chairs and walkers and other mobility aids.. Very impressed with thickness and flexibility of them, they are very comfortable to wear for an entire shift without getting too hot. The fact that they are an American made product at such a reasonable price made this choice a no-brainer for me. Will definitely be ordering more in the near future. Added more of these to our inventory of supplies for new crew members. Price went up $2, but still a great bargain for an American product of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: DTL

customer_reviews.title: Very solid work glove
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this glove, however it's pretty rigid so your finger movements will be somewhat limited. Because they are so rigid, the glove fingers can't be turned inside-out to dry. If in case you get water in them. I would have preferred them in 14", I didn't realize 12" would be too short.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and long-lasting protection for washing dishes and floors.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for washing dishes. It is true that they are bulky, but this has never lead me to drop a dish. I guess that is because the gloves are textured. I have tried many gloves that I have purchased at local stores. Unfortunately these have all been much thinner and easily are torn or punctured even when I am careful. These heavy duty gloves are reliable and long lasting and are a sure protection for my hands against the heat and damage of detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Bio 101

customer_reviews.title: Always love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Always love these gloves! In times past, I've bought them from a brick-n-mortar store, for about the same price. I've used them for many different purposes over the years. They don't wear out too easily, which is why I continue to buy them. No, the didn't wear out, I end up losing them or leaving them on a job site. Currently, I'm using them to fuel planes and they are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: PrinceXiaobao

customer_reviews.title: Cannot even feel boiling water through these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. We keep our house water at the highest temperature and use these gloves when we wash our dishes. Very good quality - last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Joy

customer_reviews.title: Very good glove just not suited for outdoor work
customer_reviews.text: Very good glove just not suited for outdoor work ...hand sweats and you take the glove off and your hands get cold ...but it's a very durable glove so my Son says....lol
customer_reviews.author: Rehertha Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Works great for handling acids
customer_reviews.text: I use these when using Oxalic/Muriatic acids and they're fantastic for the price. The PVC coating has great gripping and it comes up to about 2" below my elbow which is more than enough additional protection when handling acids and other toxic substances. These are well worth the extremely low cost for the safety they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Gloves came as expected, seem solid. I really can't say much about their durability or longevity since they are pretty new, and I don't anticipate using them much.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit bulky, they do seem to protect against drips and chemicals. The shiny part is a bit sticky but that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Inflexibility around fingers
customer_reviews.text: Decent gloves but very inflexible so doing anything that requires fingers would be difficult. Also made in China 🇨🇳
customer_reviews.author: j hook

customer_reviews.title: They STAPLED the tags through it.
customer_reviews.text: These are some tough and rugged gloves. I bought them to clean my gas grill. There is years of BBQ drippings and I didn't want to get my hands all "gunked up." Great for that us. BUT! 1 Star Reduction because they STAPLED the label and tags through it. It took a pair of pliers to get it off, and I damaged the rubber a little. They'll last forever, but maybe they didn't need to use such a heave gauge staple?! A lighter one would have been fine..... That's my $0.02 and I'm sticking to it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott the Pool Boy

customer_reviews.title: Red/itchy/burning hands after wearing.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use these gloves if you have sensitive skin. I had a terrible allergic reaction to them. Horrible rash all over hands.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.P

customer_reviews.title: Tore in few days
customer_reviews.text: I used a true blue. I saw this and thought it is a little cheaper and expected same quality. The size is too big and it tore in few days less than 10 days of use. Spend extra few bucks and go for true blue.
customer_reviews.author: Janardhan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good quality gloves, and fairly flexible. I'm using them in my motorhome for handling the sewage hose when draining the black and gray water tanks.
customer_reviews.author: BigDog1

customer_reviews.title: Well made and thoughtfully designed.
customer_reviews.text: I use for working with hot ears of corn, greasy chicken, dishes, etc., and they work perfectly. One thoughtful detail I really like is that the gloves stick to each other when you touch the wrists together - handy for not loosing them.
customer_reviews.author: zabouti

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: They are the thickness and sturdiness that I had in my mind before I bought them. I will be wearing these out and buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I use them for cleaning the leaves out of my gutters. Good, strong, quality gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use these to clean out a rabbits cage and Guinea pigs cage. They are very durable and very washable.
customer_reviews.author: crazedangel78

customer_reviews.title: Delivery a real problem!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves look fine but package was left OUTSIDE in the pouring rain and NOT inside my mailbox!
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty gloves that are easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly the gloves I was hoping they'd be. They're big enough so that my hands easily slip into them - not like those other plastic gloves that become stuck to your skin. They're super thick, so I'm not worried about anything breaching the barrier.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: If dive a concrete truck and needed something to keep hands dry. These workgreat and very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and really protecting hands from hot water. Gives really good grip too.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dishwashing
customer_reviews.text: Dishwashing gloves fall apart too quickly so I buy these instead, they last a long time. These were flexible and comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. Gloves work great for working with water and rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Charley Graham sam Graham

customer_reviews.title: great gloves
customer_reviews.text: great gloves. we use them for getting a lot of fish out of the coolers while cleaning. no more getting stung by catfish. or fins in the hand by reaching in to pull fish out to fillet.
customer_reviews.author: steven brendemuehl

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick gloves
customer_reviews.text: Used for tough jobs around the outside of the house. Worked very well

customer_reviews.text: cotton lining.... its great to keep your hand dry from sweating ...

customer_reviews.title: Chemical gloves of great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of gloves. The gloves 🧤 are great quality and I recommend them

customer_reviews.title: I can handle the truth
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves for dirty chores such as cleaning gutters, filling the truck with fuel, and yard work. My only nitpick is my hands sweat inside the gloves and I have to rinse them out on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: turkey

customer_reviews.title: thick gloves
customer_reviews.text: bought these for wearing when i am working with my honey bees - thick so they can not sting through them and yet flexible enough to grab the frames
customer_reviews.author: carson everett

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, hefty, but too big since 1 size doesn't fit all
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but thick gloves. Size is a problem, wish it came in smaller sizes because women generally need smaller ones. Other than that, they arrived on time as promised, in one big box with my other Amazon orders. These gloves can be used for any activity that requires thick & hefty gloves, except gardening. I recommend the vendor to others.
customer_reviews.author: PickyjadeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty work gloves. Superior quality. Have bought these before and why I ordered them again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty gloves are perfect for RV use working around gray/black water tanks. Excellent quality and price

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Lasted one day
customer_reviews.text: Came with a slight rip and by end of day it was useless. Very disappointing as I've had these before bought locally. Fake maybe?

customer_reviews.title: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy duty dish washing
customer_reviews.text: I use these to wash dishes in super hot water. Can't even feel the heat, they grip really well when wet too. A+

customer_reviews.title: Great for handling food on the BBQ.
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium/large hand and these fit great. I use them to pick up ribs and move food around on my smoker. Easy to clean by washing your gloved hands with some soap and water. I am going to order more as gifts to fellow BBQ'ers.
customer_reviews.author: keithace

customer_reviews.title: good fit, and i'm not sweating
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use with water/plumbing and cleaning situations. I have found that they are adequate for electrical work as well. I keep them with me now in my tool bag so I have them available all the time. I don't think I'd use them for general purpose tasks but have found them useful and versatile and at a good price.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for crackin crab and they fit the bill to a T. I can get in there breaking crab when I make gumbo or preparing a crawfish boil without poking my fingers and they keep them warm to boot when dealing with all the ice. Maybe slipping on a small cotton glove underneath will compensate for the size but other than that their great.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty rubber gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves they're very good quality for the price paid!

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to clean his boat. They work great.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for cooking the blue
customer_reviews.text: Got a batch of blue to cook up? These heavy duty pvc gloves will protect your hands from any harsh chemicals associated with your business. The color looks great with your yellow (or orange) jumpsuit as well. I would pair these with some safety goggles and work boots and you're all set for Halloween!

customer_reviews.title: Great for lobsters
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad when handling lobsters. He seems to like it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Gloves for pulling crab pots
customer_reviews.text: These are my "go to" heavy duty gloves year after year for pulling crab pots and safely holding those large "spiders" in my hands. I am an eye surgeon, and I gotta' protect my mitts!

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. grabbed these to take these to clean ...

customer_reviews.title: when the description says Cotton lining, I expected it ...
customer_reviews.text: when the description says Cotton lining, I expected it to be thick cotton lining, not paper thin. Luckily Amazon was gracious enough to help out with the situation

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep stuff off you hands
customer_reviews.text: I am a ski tuner and love these gloves. Protects my hands from the fluids being sprayed on the skis and from the sharp ski edges. The gloves are easy on and off. The gloves also are comfortable if you working with your hands.

customer_reviews.title: Their ok bought a few pair to use skinning only ...

customer_reviews.title: Best Chemical Protection in a Glove!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to protect my hands when mixing Bio-Diesel catalyst of methanol and lye. They are the ONLY pair of gloves that have held up to repeated exposure to both chemicals, separately and together. When I work with newcomers to the Bio-Diesel hobby, I tell them to only buy one pair of gloves - these are the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: KEL

customer_reviews.title: Safe Hands
customer_reviews.text: I make soap, so I use these gloves to protect my hands from the lye solution. Yes they are a bulky glove but I have not found that to be a problem in doing any of the tasks required such as stirring, pouring or picking up things that I use.

customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and high quality. They are for large hands.

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use in our water based parts washer and ...

customer_reviews.text: They're rubber, they're gloves, and they do their job. I have large hands and these seem a bit small, but I can't complain as protection is more important than a perfect fit for the jobs I use these for.

customer_reviews.text: I used these gloves for a costume (Heisenberg cook outfit) and they were perfect. Extremely thick, and I have used them for some other minor chemical activities.

On the positive side, they are clearly of good quality and will afford ample protection while working with caustic materials. For detail work like using a small paint brush, buy a box of 100 hospital type gloves.

Very sturdy, and a MUST for a demo and renovation job.

customer_reviews.text: Once in contact with liquids these gloves turn your hands into non-stick surfaces letting anything you hold slip away if not careful. The textured surface is useless. If working with wet machinery or even washing dishes these gloves are lacking. They do however protect you from liquids/chemicals well.
customer_reviews.author: tekiwibird

product_meta.title: Heavy Duty PVC Coated Work Gloves, Liquid/Chemical Resistant, Cotton Lining, Large (Wells Lamont 174L)
product_meta.description:
Heavy-duty PVC (polyvinyl chloride). Extremely flexible, blue PVC coating over cotton, seamless knit lining. Textured finish, straight thumb. 12 In. gauntlet cuff. Size: men's large.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Wells Lamont 174L Blue Heavy Duty PVC Supported. Gauntlet Cuff, Large - Heavy weight PVC coated glove. Seamless cotton knit shell. 12-Inch safety length. Very flexible and comfortable. Completely Waterproof and chemical resistant to gasoline, diesel fuels, most farm fertilizers and water based chemicals. See our chemical resistant chart for more specific chemical limitations.
feature_bullets: PVC COATING - Effective against adhesives, liquids, detergents, and dilated bases and acids - Stays flexible at lower temperatures
INSIDE COMFORT - Seamless cotton lining ensures easy removal and comfortable hands
SUPERIOR GRIP - Textured PVC coating increases general gripping ability
GLOVE CUFF - 12-Inch lined gauntlet cuff protects wrists and forearms
APPLICATIONS - Ideal for woodworking, auto assembly, trim applications, furniture Manufacturing, and more!

specifications.Included Components: Painting Supplies, Abrasives & Surface Preparation, painting-gloves
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars523 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
